Package game.ai.shared.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractBoard
    This abstract class will implement common methods shared for
    Both TictactoeBoard and Connect4Board extending from IBoard
    Cell
    The main implementation is derived from http://www.ntu.edu.sg/home/ehchua/programming/java/JavaGame_TicTacToe.html#zz-5.2
    Look at class Cell.java for more detail
    The idea is that asks the Cell draws when IBoard is changed
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameState  
    PlayerState
    The class provides the value of IPlayer
